name: Ancient Ruins
description:
Welcome adventurer!

This is an adventure puzzle game where the goal is to help  the characters to get through the dangerous ancient ruins, you do it by switching characters and helping  each other.

You control one of the players with W (up), S (down), D (right),  A (left), and press E to switch between characters.

Be careful not to step on these!   Press this plate to open doors and help your partner! You can move these rocks to press on plates or spikes!

This game is made with lots of care, we hope you like it! 

If you are interested in more stuff that we make you can contact us here:
